dc_title_s: Map of Tennessee : showing agricultural resources, counties, railways, post offices, public highways, rivers, soil formation, and location of coal, phosphate, copper and other minerals
dc_description_s: Title from portfolio cover.; Sheet has 2 large maps, depicting Counties and Geological fomations, and 4 small maps, entitled: Cotton, Wheat, Corn, and Tobacco and peanuts.; Text on verso (on 23 panels), entitled: Tennessee, the land of opportunity, of mountain and valley and plateau and plain, of fertile and productive soil, extends a heaty welcome to thrifty home seekers.; Includes ill. of state capitol and ports. of T.F. Peck and Ben W. Hooper.|77 x 118 centimeters|Scale 1:760,320, 12 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Issued by the Tennessee Dept. of Agriculture and the Bureau of Immigration : (Nashville)
